meanings.definition: A subdivision of a district in India.
meanings.sent1: The talukas in India are like small towns within a larger area.
meanings.sent2: The government official visited several talukas to assess the local needs.
meanings.sent3: The talukas decided to have a friendly competition to see who could grow the biggest pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: In the talukas of India, each community is a unique piece of a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant markets in the talukas bustled with activity and chatter.

meanings.sent1: Many talukas make up the administrative divisions of the region.
meanings.sent2: The map displayed all the talukas that formed the district.
meanings.sent3: The talukas gathered for a celebration of unity and diversity.
meanings.sent4: The talukas stood out like jewels in the crown of the district.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the various talukas revealed the rich cultural tapestry of the area.
